content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"MSTD Recognition Program\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is designed to reward dedication and contributions to our division’s overall success. Our department has employees who regularly solve non-trivial project challenges, significantly influence customer relationships, contribute to educational activities and mentoring programs, regularly participate in department initiatives, and are involved in MSTD’s success.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"That is why, in 2020, we launched the MSTD Recognition program to help employees and their managers share in the achievements of their colleagues and celebrate the best.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":54000,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1cfaa66e-56ae-48ee-98ab-7a3fcea4fd53/cran_character_14- Recognition program.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1cfaa66e-56ae-48ee-98ab-7a3fcea4fd53/cran_character_14- Recognition program.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"cran_character_14- Recognition program.png\",\"name\":\"cran_character_14- Recognition program.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1cfaa66e-56ae-48ee-98ab-7a3fcea4fd53\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":500,\"height\":354},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Who is eligible for recognition?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Those who go the extra mile and contribute to our initiatives.
